rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {0085, 0124, 0125, 1017, 1207, 1211, 2241, 2322, 2965, 3255, 3879, 4527, 4636, 4638} Do true Otherwise Any co-req unit set {ENG-IEEM, ENG-MECH, MECHENG01, MECHENG02}

description: The unit conveys the fundamental knowledge necessary for the analysis and design of mechanical engineering structures. It builds on aspects of applied forces and basic structural analysis that are contained in various units in level 1. It provides a focus for this prior learning with respect to the analysis of components and structures within a mechanical engineering context.
